"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is about a 56-year-old patient who underwent transsphenoidal hypophysectomy for pituitary tumour. The patient has low ACTH, TSH, FSH, LH levels. The patient is likely to have developed hypopituitarism due to the surgery, which would lead to low hormone levels.
